sentences.english: The replier said that he went to a Chrisitan high school when he was young.
sentences.chinese: 迴應當中的一位網友說到自己求學時的經歷。

sentences.english: I took a photography class in college.
sentences.chinese: 我在大學時修了一堂攝影課。

sentences.english: Did you take statistics at college?
sentences.chinese: 你上大學時學統計學了嗎？

sentences.english: When I was at college, I met my ex-wife.
sentences.chinese: 我是上大學時認識我的前妻的。

sentences.english: On my first day of school, I didn't speak a word of English.
sentences.chinese: 當我第一天上學時，我連一個英文單詞都說不出口。

sentences.english: He (was selected ) the monitor when he was at school.
sentences.chinese: 他在上學時被選爲班長。

sentences.english: In school teach him it is far more honourable to fail than to cheat.
sentences.chinese: 教他求學時不及格比作弊來得剛正。

sentences.english: After school, I went to Maxine's classroom to ask her wether my wallet is at home.
sentences.chinese: 放學時，我到阿妹的班級問問她有沒有看見我的錢包。

sentences.english: The successful businessman used to work as a bartender while in college.
sentences.chinese: 這位成功的商人念大學時曾當過酒保。

sentences.english: What was your best subject in college? English.
sentences.chinese: 大學時你哪門功課最好？英語。

sentences.english: I took a course on Native American history and culture in college.
sentences.chinese: 上大學時，我選過一門美洲土著歷史和文化的課程。

sentences.english: She did lots of acting when she was at university.
sentences.chinese: 她在大學時演過很多戲。

sentences.english: College entrance score average for the SAT is 1,294.
sentences.chinese: 入學時學術能力評估考試的平均成績爲1294。

sentences.english: When the age of Ugly philosophy approaches, the breakthrough first happens in literature.
sentences.chinese: 醜學時代來臨時，最先在文藝領域找到了突破口。

sentences.english: Susannah won the calligraphy prize when she was at school.
sentences.chinese: 蘇珊娜上學時贏得了書法獎。

definition: junior high school (Tw)/abbr. for 國民中學|国民中学[guo2 min2 zhong1 xue2]
elementary school (Tw)/abbr. for 國民小學|国民小学[guo2 min2 xiao3 xue2]
to study at the same school/fellow student/classmate/CL:位[wei4],個|个[ge4]
the Great Learning, one of the Four Books 四書|四书[Si4 shu1] in Confucianism
once/already/former/previously/ever/(past tense marker used before verb or clause)
student studying abroad/(foreign) exchange student/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4]
